Posts.Content: Yumaira wrote: I recently finished 6 rounds of chemo and im suppose to be starting radiation soon, im just so scared because the tumor was in my left breast which means the radiation will be very close to my heart, i had a lumpectomy and the nodes were all clear, im only 23 years old and i dont want to get radiation and have heart problems later on, plus the type of cancer i had was medullary which most of the time has a good outcome, and usually dosent spread, i just dont know what to do, my onc says i must have it done but, i hadmy first consultation today with the radiation dr and she kinda scared me a little, saying that since i was so young i had a good chance of later in life having some side effects from the treatment, is there anyone out there that has had radiation on theleft side and is doing good after a couple years?? Dx 8/18/2011, 3cm, Stage I, ER-/PR- Log in to post a reply
